roles.name: Founder
roles.description: The visionary leader who started it all. You have a natural talent for inspiring others and making strategic decisions.
strengths: Higher XP gain from all actions (+15%)
Better event outcome chances (+10% success rate)
Stronger leadership skills boost team morale

roles.name: CTO
roles.description: The technical mastermind behind the product. You excel at building scalable systems and innovative solutions.
strengths: Better quality outcomes from tech actions

roles.name: CMO
roles.description: The marketing genius who knows how to reach customers. You understand virality, growth, and brand building.
strengths: Higher virality gain from marketing actions

roles.name: CFO
roles.description: The financial strategist who keeps the company solvent. You excel at managing cash flow and making profitable decisions.
strengths: Better loan terms and financial deals

roles.name: Product Manager
roles.description: The bridge between users and technology. You excel at understanding customer needs and delivering value.

roles.name: Growth Hacker
roles.description: The data-driven growth expert. You specialize in rapid user acquisition and viral growth strategies.
strengths: Marketing and product skills are 15% more effective

roles.name: Operations Manager
roles.description: The efficiency expert who keeps everything running smoothly. You excel at process optimization and resource management.
strengths: All actions cost 10% less action points
Reduced burnout from better work-life balance
